Sen: Joni Ernst initially criticized efforts to include any add-ons to replenish the Paycheck Protection Program, but later stated that she pushed for hospital and COVID-19 testing funding that was included in the replenishment of PPE funds.
The Iowa Democratic Party claims that Er: 19 testing for weeks before it was included in an interim coronavirus relief bill passed by the Senate.
Ernst: s change in messaging regarding the coronavirus relief plan and her support for the Paycheck Protection Program were referenced by the Iowa Democratic Party as evidence of her reversal.
